Title: Transcriptome profiles of P. aeruginosa treated with manuka honey and its key components
Description: The aim of this study was to characterise the transcriptomic changes in P. aeruginosa PA14 following treatment with antimicrobial manuka honey and its key components (sugar, methyglyoxal, sugar + methylglyoxal) for 30 minutes at a subinhibitory concentration (0.5x MIC). mRNA profiling was conducted to gain mechanistic insights into the mode of action of antimicrobial manuka honey.
